metadata.title: CVE-2020-13320 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab before version 12.10.13 that alloweda project member with limited permissions to view the project securitydashboard.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
